explanation: [0-0] In the middle of the frame is a pink card with a white semi-circular area at the top. Inside the semi-circle is a cupcake or similar dessert with some designs printed on it. On both sides of the cup are metal scoops with yellow handles. Below the circular area are the words "ICE CREAM ROLLS" in white against a pink background. The top and bottom of the card are decorated with pink frosting and colorful candies. The background is pink.

[0-3] Next, a pair of hands wearing black gloves flips open the card, revealing a purple Milka chocolate bar placed on a round metal tabletop with a microphone beside it. The gloved hands open the Milka chocolate and tear off the purple wrapper.

[3-10] The gloved hands then begin chopping the chocolate into pieces with metal scoops and drizzle black cream over it. Then, a hand pours milk from a bottle onto the chocolate. The gloved hands then use two metal scoops to further chop and mix the chocolate with the milk, spreading it evenly on the tabletop.

[10-13] As the mixture gradually solidifies into a square of chocolate ice cream, a layer of brown topping and black cream is drizzled on top. The gloved hands then skillfully roll the ice cream into a roll and place it in a pink paper cup printed with the words "ICE CREAM ROLLS."
